ModMetaData.name: Multiplayer Fog of War
ModMetaData.author: Luca De Petrillo, Zetrith
ModMetaData.description: This mod adds a real Fog of War based on Field of Views, to limit visiblity and interaction of elements on the map, for both player and AI. The Multiplayer mod and its multifaction feature are supported (but not required for it to work).
